documents.document: RT @bhrenton: This is the second individual who is not a member of Congress to test positive in the congressional outbreak (Rep. Pressley's
RT @bhrenton: Latest update to @CovidWh's Congressional tracker includes 10 positive cases around the events of January 6. The most recent

We urge all members of Congress who were in the Capitol on January 6 to get tested and quarantine until they receive their results. We hope for speedy recoveries for those who are infected and wish that member of Congress would set an example for the nation by wearing a mask.

We're back. As we begin to see more Covid-19 diagnoses from members of Congress, including many who were present in a room with maskless GOP lawmakers, we have tracked 9 cases since January 4. Follow along and see all cases in Congress here: https://t.co/Gl1CYMuqzn https://t.co/actLRMmkFz
RT @bhrenton: We have now made the Congressional Covid-19 tracker available on @CovidWh as we begin to track what may turn out to be a supe
RT @bhrenton: New: Rep. Brad Schneider is now the 9th member of Congress to test positive for Covid-19 since January 4. He is the 3rd to no
RT @bhrenton: New: We have now tracked 8 Covid-19 cases in Congress since January 4, including 2 as a result of direct exposure from a lock
RT @bhrenton: Major update to our Congressional Covid-19 Tracker: We may be seeing the beginnings of a superspreader event in Congress as t

Here is a table separated by events. We are particularly seeking to obtain more information relating to last Friday's White House Christmas party, where Jenna Ellis was in attendance. https://t.co/tyD9uKwe2J

We're back! With recent diagnoses of Rudy Giuliani and Jenna Ellis, we have tracked 35 contacts with 2 positive cases. 4 events are under investigation: Events in AZ, MI, GA and the Christmas party. Follow: https://t.co/LPfi6TYhC5 Submit tips: https://t.co/XXkt8K92cj https://t.co/GFWibNgUJS
We will work on tracking Mayor Giuliani's contacts and any potential links to previous iterations of our tracker. More soon. https://t.co/GXYQwZdkoG
RT @bhrenton: For the past few months we at @CovidWh have spent much of our work tracking Covid-19 infections at the White House, but what
RT @bhrenton: We at @CovidWh have been tracking Covid-19 cases in the WH in 3 "waves." If we put all these infections together (and these a

Latest version of our tracker includes 3 new positives reported by @JenniferJJacobs: Andrew Giuliani, Donald Trump Jr. and Hannah MacInnis. This round of White House infections is now up to 20 positives. Track it here: https://t.co/okBW5NfRr4 Submit tips: https://t.co/br3vuprd8H https://t.co/jUZwgCeMYb
RT @JenniferJJacobs: News: Don Jr, the presidents son, has tested positive for coronavirus. He escaped the virus when people around him go

The rapid influx of positive tests, many linked to the party, is not surprising, as 8 days have elapsed since Election Night and this is usually the time for the virus to incubate and individuals to develop symptoms. Here is an epi curve of the current positive tests. https://t.co/yOaFWANkGw

Latest update of our tracker includes 17 positives, 7 of whom confirmed to have been at the election night party. We are in the process of upgrading our dashboard. Follow along here: https://t.co/EObRTuiDUv Submit a tip: https://t.co/br3vuprd8H https://t.co/WJKC2Iln2r
If you are on this list, get tested and quarantine to prevent further spread. If you have a tip, submit it here: https://t.co/br3vuprd8H

Major update to our @CovidWh outbreak tracker we have been working on listing all contacts from the election night party. Latest stats: - 11 positives, 5 of whom were at the election night party - 51 total contacts (and counting) https://t.co/okBW5NfRr4 https://t.co/yJS31ncdDL
RT @bhrenton: We are investigating if Mr. Bossie was present at the election night event. https://t.co/1MjsoH7MW6

Latest update of our chief of staff outbreak tracker includes 8 positives with the recent diagnosis of Secretary Ben Carson. Follow along at https://t.co/okBW5NfRr4. We are currently listing all present at the election night party. Submit a tip: https://t.co/br3vuprd8H https://t.co/ZmmJmUlXOk

Latest version of our tracker reflects reporting from @maggieNYT and @JenniferJJacobs the chief of staff outbreak is up to 7 positives. Follow along at https://t.co/okBW5MYg2u. We will be tracing through events Meadows attended. Submit a tip at https://t.co/XXkt8KqD3R. https://t.co/jEBe6dtkq5
RT @bhrenton: Latest update of @CovidWh Round 3 includes 5 positives, as reported by @JenniferJJacobs and @maggieNYT. Follow along here: h
Coronavirus is back in the White House, this time around Chief of Staff Mark Meadows. Follow along here: https://t.co/okBW5NfRr4 Submit a tip here: https://t.co/XXkt8K92cj https://t.co/scBD26vGuO
Round 3table coming soon. https://t.co/9YF9I8fhZ4
RT @bhrenton: "He needs to be in quarantine," @ashishkjha says on the VP circle outbreak. "The evidence on this is overwhelmingly clear and
RT @AnaCabrera: CNN has learned Zach Bauer, Pence's "body man," is one of the staffers who has tested positive for coronavirus. In his role
RT @JenniferJJacobs: PENCE tested negative today, according to a statement from his office, the morning after his chief of staff diagnosed.

We have launched a new VP outbreak tracker on our website. Check https://t.co/Fni6rVqvlK for the latest updates. Most recent results are: - 5 positives - 2 negatives (VP and SLOTUS) - 1 contact Tips welcome at https://t.co/CwVSyHFRcM. https://t.co/j5FpkrDlxx
RT @bhrenton: First release of a new dashboard tracking the latest COVID-19 outbreak at the White House. Now tracking 3 positives, 2 negati
RT @bhrenton: It's live! We at @Covidwh are out with a new website. See the latest version of the dashboard, learn more about the project a

White House COVID-19 Tracker update, 10/8: We added one new positive case today a member of the White House press corps. Total positives stand at 37; total contacts - 328. https://t.co/Z78CZ9wILo https://t.co/u73ZupYBJx
Good news, per an internal memo https://t.co/UHxikpqvTJ
thanks to our first 1k followers. Humbled by the interest, saddened that this tracker is necessary at all. Reminder that our tipline is open: https://t.co/CwVSyHXs4k

Just a note for those interested in our data - we are adding only contacts that seem to be in the chain of transmission from the WH. As such, these contacts would not be added. We wish them a speedy recovery and hope their congressman gets tested. https://t.co/2b2v1GGo3Y
RT @PeterJ_Walker: Give us a follow over @CovidWh to stay up with the latest. Our data: https://t.co/Nqumd20O4b (mobile) https://t.co/6EI
RT @PeterJ_Walker: Final wrap-up for this evening on WH COVID: We end the day at 311 contacts. 34 positive, 75 currently negative, and 2
Hats off to a journalist who happens to be a student - imagine what youll do once COVID no longer holds center stage. Signed, The other two people running this account https://t.co/ofxAMZvu0q
RT @PeterJ_Walker: Update on the debate prep event: the tweet suggesting the Pences were there has been deleted. As such, we're taking th
RT @democracynow: .@CovidWh, a tool created by @bhrenton, monitors the growing number of people in Trumps circle who were exposed or infec
RT @PeterJ_Walker: Obviously this is a huge shock - not yet added to our tracker, however. No info yet on whether these cases were discove
8pm ET Update 277 total contacts. Within the Administration, we have 80 contacts (13 pos / 24 neg / 43 unknown) Stay up to date at: https://t.co/Gg1cIDTlpe https://t.co/YuGfQDqVpk

@StephenMolldrem @COVID19Tracking @marganina Hey Stephen - we are not at all affiliated with the Atlantic. One of our collaborators also volunteers for the @COVID19Tracking, but there is no relationship there. We are aggregating data from public news reports on the WH Outbreak. Thanks for taking the time!
RT @PeterJ_Walker: With Kayleigh McEnany testing positive, our positive count is up to 19. The WH press secretary is the first contact we'
RT @PeterJ_Walker: Finally - we have a new home at https://t.co/8wDwPMvdkK. Visit our dashboards there for the latest, or drop us a tip at
RT @PeterJ_Walker: Wrap up on #whcovidtracker for the evening. Thx to everyone who has contributed to our public database or given feedba

There are currently 7 administration or other Republican leaders who have declined to quarantine following negative tests from the WH outbreak #whcovidcluster #whcovidtracker https://t.co/Z78CZ9wILo https://t.co/k4CU4JnVBk

270 contacts in our database overall, 164 of which attended one of these events. Far more unknowns than answers at this point from this #whcovidcluster https://t.co/7MwopxHnGG to dig deep into this view https://t.co/5vTXMlnq3V

We'll keep putting out the most up-to-date data on the WH COVID outbreak thanks to our crowd sourced contact tracing. Follow this account for official updates, and check the latest at any time https://t.co/Z78CZ9wILo https://t.co/PUrUBXg3To
Positivity rate: March average: 4.30% April average: 4.41% Number of days above 5%: March: 3 April: 5 https://t.co/kBg0LcjzQa
@daleen_gerber Needs to rolled out effectively and quickly
How does Aprils stats compare to March's stats? New Cases: March- 33 342 April- 33 053 289 more in March however April has a day less than March and 3x more public holidays https://t.co/3pHyzDUq1w

April 2021 roundup for #COVID19 in SA: - 33 053 Cases (High: 1 674, Low: 437, Avg: 1 102) - Average Daily Pos. Rate: 4.41% (High: 9.22%, Low: 2.71%) - 1 504 Deaths (High: 130, Low: 8, Avg: 50) - 53 778 Vaccinations (20 days- 0 administered 21 days less than 1000 administered) https://t.co/AQYuXg8N83

No Champions League. Not even Europa League. Were in a relegation battle. South Africa in the mud pass it on https://t.co/HT8SRHHg6o
Writing a small paragraph about the acknowledgment of the upsurge in NC, FS NW and people breaking COVID-19 restrictions does literally nothing in trying to combat these issues.

"We seriously condemn some posts we have seen on social media depicting large parties and where youngsters make a mockery of super-spreader events, even boasting to host some of their own." So you've seen it and taking no action although going against restrictions? https://t.co/7jVmvpdUbA
This did not need 2 weeks to decide on this. Valuable time lost https://t.co/3ViBNQrtvB
